generalKnowledge.question: What year did the Titanic sink in the Atlantic Ocean on 15 April, on its maiden voyage from Southampton?

Which Dutch darts player won the 2012 BDO World Championship at the Lakeside Country Club, Frimley Green on 15 January?
Which metal was discovered by Hans Christian Oersted in 1825?
What is the capital of Portugal?
How many breaths does the human body take daily?
Who was Prime Minister of Great Britain from 1841 to 1846?
What is the chemical symbol for silver?
Who invented Cat’s Eyes in 1934 to improve road safety?
What is the world’s smallest bird?

What did Al Capone’s business card state his occupation was?

films.question: In which year was The Godfather first released?
Which actor won the best actor Oscar for the films Philadelphia (1993) and Forrest Gump (1994)?
How many self-referential cameos did Alfred Hitchcock make in his films from 1927-1976 – 33, 35 or 37?

Which actress played Mary Poppins in the 1964 film Mary Poppins?

In which 1995 film did Sandra Bullock play the character Angela Bennett – Wrestling Ernest Hemingway, The Net or 28 Days?

Which actor provided the voice for the character Nemo in the 2003 film Finding Nemo?
Which prisoner dubbed ‘the most violent prisoner in Britain’ was the subject of a 2009 film?
films.answer: Charles Bronson (the film was titled Bronson)
